text:
The question on who will be FTII's next chairman still remains a question as Gulshan Grover has reportedly turned down the offer. After Anupam Kher stepped down, Gulshan Grover was being considered as an apt replacement.
However, stating that he has some personal and professional commitments, Grover declined the opportunity.
Reports further claim that Gulshan and his son are planning to venture into the world of films as producers, for which they will need time.
Agencies
A DNA report has quoted the Veteran actor as saying,
"Yes, I’m unable to take this up. I would have loved to be of service to the future generations of cinema and I truly stand behind what the FTII believes in and stands for."
The meeting to choose the next chairman of FTII has been scheduled for 18th December 2018.
